Game played in the 2002 World Cup, 1st Round Group C

Date: Monday, June 03, 2002

Brazil 2 - 1 Turkey
Goals:
  45'+2' Hasan Sas
  Ronaldo 50'
  Rivaldo (penalty) 87'

Pos = Position. It shows the player's natural position but not necessarily the one he played in this particular game
